com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon

Class EmoticonSearchFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon.EmoticonSearchFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, EmoticonSearchAdapter.ItemSelectListener

    public final class EmoticonSearchFragment
extends Fragment
implements EmoticonSearchAdapter.ItemSelectListener
    A simple Fragment subclass to provide search interface for emoticon using the database. After initialization, this will display the list of recent emoticons. Once user enter the search query, this will search for the emoticons from database. This class is for internal use only.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  EmoticonSearchFragment.SearchEmoticonTask
      Async task to load search emoticons into database in background and refresh the list in main thread.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

      • searchEmoticon

        private void searchEmoticon(@Nullable
                            String searchQuery)
        Search the emoticon based on the search query. If the length of query is 0 or null, it will display recent emoticon or else it will search into database using EmoticonSearchFragment.SearchEmoticonTask.
        Parameters:
        searchQuery - Query text to search.
        See Also:
        EmoticonSearchFragment.SearchEmoticonTask

      • showKeyboard

        private void showKeyboard()
        Show the keyboard.

      • setEmoticonSelectListener

        public void setEmoticonSelectListener(@NonNull
                                      EmoticonSelectListener emoticonSelectListener)
        Set the EmoticonSelectListener to get notify whenever the emoticon is selected or deleted. This function is for internal use only.
        Parameters:
        emoticonSelectListener - EmoticonSelectListener

      • setEmoticonProvider

        public void setEmoticonProvider(@Nullable
                                EmoticonProvider emoticonProvider)
        Set the EmoticonProvider to render different images for unicode. If the value is null, system emoticon images will render.
        Parameters:
        emoticonProvider - EmoticonProvider
